description: Repographics services include printing documents from hard copy originals and electronic format
full_summary:
### Repographic Printing Services Announcement

#### Reference Number

* **Reference Number:** CB-286-94320694
* **Amendment Number:** 4

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number:** 1000032977
* **Publication Date:** January 10, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 25, 2024 (02:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025

#### Tender Status

* **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Notice Type:** Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
* **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open Bidding)
* **Selection Criteria:** Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)

#### Trade and Security Requirements

* **Trade Agreements:** Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement)
* **Security Requirements:** Documents may contain confidential information and up to "Protected B" security clearance.

#### Service Requirements

* The required reprographics services involve:
	+ Copying and/or short run printing from supplied hard copy originals and electronic format (PDF)
	+ Binding documents
	+ Scanning paper documents to electronic format (PDF)

#### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the request for proposal and amendments, are available for download at: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29064/ppsc_rfp-eng_1000032977_2023-a000184---repographic-printing-services.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29064/ppsc_rfp-eng_1000032977_amendment-001.pdf>

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Jessica Roy-Labelle
* **Email:** [jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca](mailto:jessica.roy-labelle@ppsc-sppc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** (343) 550-9703
* **Address:** 800 Burrard Street, Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada

#### Language of Documentation

The language of documentation for this tender is English and French.

---
